ComicInfo.Title: Get Some, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary: Dynamite Entertainment is proud to welcome Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson's The Boys as they present issue #8 of the series! The Legend has The Boys investigating the murder of a relative, apparently at the hands of a super... but the winding trail will take many turns, and all roads lead to the Tek Knight! What secret does this man of machinery hold? The Legend has the Boys investigating the murder of a relative apparently at the hands of a super...but the winding trail will take many turns and all roads lead to the Tek Knight! What secret does this man of machinery hold? Will Tek Knight and Butcher's mutt have a hump-off? Only time will tell...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:19:18. [CVDB110990]
ComicInfo.Characters: Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Mother's Milk, Paul Drake, Swingwing, Tek Knight, Terror, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Locations: Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State, Red Rooster, Westchester
